name: slm_lab
description: Modular Deep Reinforcement Learning framework in PyTorch.

scripts.retro_analyze: python -c 'import sys; from slm_lab.experiment import retro_analysis; retro_analysis.retro_analyze(sys.argv[1])'
scripts.retro_eval: python -c 'import sys; from slm_lab.experiment import retro_analysis; retro_analysis.retro_eval(sys.argv[1])'
scripts.kill: pkill -f run_lab; pkill -f slm-env; pkill -f ipykernel; pkill -f ray; pkill -f orca; pkill -f Xvfb
scripts.update: conda env update -f environment.yml; yarn install;

author: kengz <kengzwl@gmail.com>, lgraesser
